extendedInfo.description: Happy Sad Face helps you keep track of your children's behavior.  The smiley faces are a graphical reinforcement with which small children quickly identify.Track happy faces (or sad faces) for each child.  Happy Sad Face allows you to track from 1 to 5 faces for multiple children.  Simply tap on the face to change from happy to sad or vice versa.Free Version Includes:- Unlimited Children- 1 to 5 Faces per Child- Assign Different Colors to Each Child

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.comment: We usually put a happy face on the board at home and when the kids don\'t listen, it becomes sad...sad faces mean no TV or video games...but with there kids it gets hard to remember who has happy/sad faces...now I can keep track wherever we go :)
reviews.author: A Google User
